attributes.action: Allow voting against petitions on this site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Would it be fairer if there was an option to vote against a petition on this site.
Where members of the public feel equally strongly against a petitions sentiment, this would allow a more balanced view.
perhaps the total could show both sets of votes

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
